alert.note: Alert for Barry; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 11:59AM EST until January 15 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST MONDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Barry and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 4 PM EST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. &&
